author: uptodatedevelopers
title: Cardano French Community
description: Отсутствие учебных ресурсов о возможностях, предлагаемых сообществом CARDANO для франкоговорящих стран.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal has identified a problem and a solution to solve the problem and seems that it fits into the challenge objectives. The seeds of the grass exist but is unclear if they will grow to a crop as the proposal lacks in relevant information.
f6_assessments.q1:
It is unclear who has the necessary skills and experience to make the translations form English to French. The proposer should analyse the potential topics that might be of interest for the target audience. After this stage is done the proposers should create a list of possible/viable deliverables (now many documents/videos will be created/delivered in a predefined period of time? what will be the covered subjects?) and a way to measure the usability of this materials (how many users downloaded/Viewed the documents/videos? they were useful to the audience? etc.).

The budget should be broken down into identifiable items and the proposer should be aware of all resources needed (how many translators will be necessary? a content creator will be enough to carry the work? how much will be spent for these people work? how much will cost the stationary, apps licences, rent of content hosting? etc.)

The proposer should be aware of the risks and challenges relevant for a successful implementation. (why people will follow you and your content and not the other available materials from other sources?)
f6_assessments.q2: Unfortunately the proposal lacks in providing enough info to assess it. Maybe next time, after reviewing the aspects necessary to build a viable proposal will stand a good chance to be funded.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer presents the problem of lack of resources for French speaking countries. As a solution, the creation of a french speaking web platform is presented. This proposal is in line with the challenge as it would increase the engagement of non English speakers at Cardano. The proposal does not present a plan to remain sustainable in the future. The proposal appears to have the potential to have a major impact on the Cardano community by attracting new French speakers members.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer presents your startup's website as evidence of its experience despite not specifying its members. The budget was not detailed, so it is not possible to assess whether it is reasonable. The proposal does not have a deadline for completion of the work, nor does it present a plan explaining what and how it will be done. The proposal does not appear to pose greater risks for its implementation. The proposer presents a great idea with the potential to have a great impact on the Cardano community, but it lacks some important information such as a roadmap with milestones and budget breakdown so that we can better assess whether the proposal can be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer clearly presents the target problem and its solution. The proposal lacks KPIs or metrics, a roadmap with milestones and a deadline for completion. This information is essential for us to be able to track and evaluate the progress and success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely that Lack of learning resources on the opportunities offered   for French-speaking countries. It is clear that this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief by creating  a French-speaking web platform . 
This proposal shows somewhat how it adds value to the Cardano system by creating a French website with educational content.  Key metrics are  not stated but they would be  number of articles, blog posts, educational articles, news articles, podcasts.Proposal is at a very basic level and doesnt show any details on what is going to be done to resolve the problem.I can say that this proposal does not adequately addresses the challenge  hence i have given it a 1 star rating.
 
one way proposer can improve it is by continuing to build and send press releases to media of your country or social media relating to your subject. Sometimes that one step might motivate someone to view the link and add credibility for your project and give him a better idea on the project which enables him to vote for the project. 

You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise.

I am qualified to write this assessment based on being a translator since 1992 at the State Broadcasting Corporation as well as since that time,running my own translation agency, working with the two native languages of my country as well as working on various translation projects into other languages, including translation, transcription and proofreading.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers have provided no evidence  of themselves with their skills and experience in content creation, video creation, translation or these sort of projects.  No Linkedin profiles are given here.   The links are not sufficient. There is no way to know if the proposer is competent to do the site.The budget is   not reasonable to achieve the set goals as there is no way to know what the site would consist of in terms of functionality. The proposer has not provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required  
There is no plan for additional funding  if objectives are not met. Theres no detailed timetable   Resources  necessary to implement the proposal are not described.  
 This proposal doesnt contain anything beyond a single figure of funds required hence I have given it a 1 star rating.   
 I would encourage you to consider this as constructive feedback, improve the proposal and resubmit in the next round. 


A piece of advice... You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise. A proposer who has considered this, would be looked on more favorably since it shows that they are prepared for various situations and eventualities
f6_assessments.q2:
There is no roadmap with milestones  .  No Metrics or KPIs. 
The information provided is not sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal hence I have given it a 1 star rating. The proposer has not identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties.

Nonetheless one piece of advice for the proposer.  Make as many metrics which you can track easily. Use Trello or Notion or some similar project management tool.

f6_assessments.q0:
The project seems interesting but, even if you are describing well the problem, you need to precise a lot more many items from your plateform:
•	How will you develop it (planning, roadmap, milestones, budget associated, key KPI to follow how your plateform work, where your plateform work (phones, windows etc…))
•	How you will market it in order to be known by the French community
•	How you will translate the documentation in French
f6_assessments.q1: The description of the team is basic and unclear. You don't describe how you will develop the platform and the resource (human and budget) you need and their experience. You just describe how it will operate when the plaform is online. You also don't describe how the plaform will earn income to operate. The fund requested are not detailed at all.
f6_assessments.q2: No KPI, no milestone to follow the development of your proposal. You need to describe a lot more how you will develop your project and how the community can measure its development. There are many way to measure the progress of your plateform (number of connection, number of members, number of documents etc…)

f6_assessments.q0:
This team proposes a French-speaking web platform to help the French community learn resources on the opportunities offered by the CARDANO community for French-speaking countries. Therefore, this problem is within the challenge. 
But to better assess how this proposal impact what challenge given, I think the team should provide some key metrics that they will track. As the idea of this project, I think they can provide some key metrics about the content they will publish, or traffic to their website after time... 
After all, because of lacking these infos. I rate them 3 out of 5
f6_assessments.q1:
To implement this project, they need a complex plan that mixes between developing the system, marketing, content translating... but the only thing in this proposal is about Frech community introduction and their solution explanation. 
My advice is that the team should take their time to ask users in their communities and visualize which features should be had, which activities should be held... for their idea, then setting all of the necessary things to a detailed roadmap, then breakdown the need budget for that roadmap, and put some goal or key metric for tracking their work... those things are the basic component for CA, vCA assess the feasibility of their project.
f6_assessments.q2:
There is no roadmap, timeline, and key metrics that can help people to audit the project. 
Even no detailed explanations about their solution, features of the platform to solve the problem that they already explain well in the current context that they're aware of. 
As I advice in the feasibility comment, they should provide more detail info like that to help Catalyst community assess their project in both feasibility and auditability.

f6_assessments.q0:
There is a conflict between the problem statement and the solution for the problem:
-The problem is lacking of learning resources about Cardano in French. However, the solution is to build a platform. (just a platform without buiding the content, but the content will offered by Cardano community, the community will upload learning resources in French as the proposers explains.) In my opinion, the proposal's purpose should be bringing the resources for the community, it should not ask the community to create the resources for the platform of the proposal.
Therefor, I assess this proposal does not address the objectives laid out in the challenge. I strongly disagree it is impactful.
I highly recommend the team should re-set the goals in which benefit for the Cardano community would be the first criteria.
f6_assessments.q1:
After resetting the goals, the team should build the proposal by fulfilling information such as: how success looks like, roadmap with milestone and timetable, a sensible and conductible plan which describes clearly what is being done and how to do, a budget broken down into identifiable items, type and number of the team with evidences of the team' experience and skills relevant to proposal's implementation,etc. 
Because of missing all information above, I strongly disagree the proposal is feasible.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposers does not provide any information for auditability. 
I also recommend the proposers should add metrics/KPIs after providing roadmap and milestone and time horizon as I suggested above, for the community (and challenge team) audits the progress and the success of the proposal.
I strongly disagree the proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal raises a clear issue, in line with the criteria of the challenege. In the sense that it would allow French speakers to access the platform and thus develop the integration of this public in the ecosystem. The positive impact is therefore clear, but could perhaps have been developed a little more regarding the specific impact on the Catalyst ecosystem. The explanation of the project is clear and consistent, but the KPIs are not clearly identifiable.
f6_assessments.q1: The website provided is very informative and gives a good understanding of the start-up's direction. The video also provides additional information. It would have been interesting to give more precise information on one of the key members of the group to which to refer. The budget seems realistic and coherent, only it would have been necessary to accompany it with a detailed plan of the expenses and supported by a plan explaining more precisely the stages of the project.
f6_assessments.q2: Since the roadmap and KPIs are not indicated, this does not help the transparency of this project. It would have been nice to be able to refer to dates, success indicators, to deepen the communication of the precise objectives of the team. It is true that this project is intended to serve directly the development of the community, but it would have been important to clarify the team's awareness of the need to communicate their progress to the community.

f6_assessments.q0: It is indisputable that this proposal identifies a problem within the challenge, access in the French language is a need that can have an impact worldwide, especially if this proposal allows access to quality translations and other documents. It must be clear that today automatic translation exists, thanks to other applications, however technical documents and the like must be properly translated. From this point of view this proposal can add value. It is necessary that the proposal works better with the challenge metrics and shows the possibility of being expanded for future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal raises the existence of experience in the matter, however there are no supports in this regard. There is talk of a high number of team members, however there is no description of their characteristics and their types of work. There is a global budget, without a description and that does not show its elements. Nor is there a calendar or work plan. Thus your implementation plan is not adequate at the moment. No risks have been identified, nor have relevant challenges been identified for the implementation of this proposal. In this way, it is a good proposal but it must be better elaborated in this regard.
f6_assessments.q2: In this regard, the proposal is really discreet, since there is no roadmap with milestones that allow establishing a work horizon. What is called workflow is insufficient to provide a clear and understandable description of the target problem. In this way, there is no clear solution to address a well-identified problem.

f6_assessments.q0: I agree that this proposal addresses the challenge since it wants to create a platform (a website) for the French-speaking community, especially target to DRC Congo. Although the idea of updating about Cardano on a French website is good, I don't think it is convenient for users to discuss, have conversation or cooperate.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal is not written completely. I strongly disagree that it can be implemented successfully. There is no action plan, team, timeline, budget, risks.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal doesn't provide me enough information to assess its progress. There is no metrics/ KPIs, roadmap, time horizon.
